summary: Seventeen-year-old Grantham struggles to find his way as a man when a spontaneous road trip thrusts him into the care of a feisty eighty-one-year-old African-American woman named Rose.
cast: Jake T. Austin|Marla Gibbs|Tessa Thompson|Ryan Spahn|L.A. Winters|Jon Lee Cope|Garrett Kruithof|Cody Robinson|Mark W. Lee|David Ditmore|B.J. Arnett|Gianna Rea Brock|Greg Poteet|Ore'yanna Baker
title: Grantham & Rose
